alert.note: Alert for Chilton; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 1:03PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Chilton and south central Shelby Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 103 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Calera. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Calera, Columbiana, Shelby and Highway 145 and CR 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
